All news in one application, Get one, Read All!If you like this app, you can buy the ads free version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.eric.psgnews##Best News Prize##No notification##No news list ads##No bookmarks adsSingapore News news source list:* The Straits Times* Channel News Asia* AsiaOne* Yahoo News* TODAY Online* The Business Times* The New Paper* Xinmsn* BBC* CNN* USA today* Fox* The Independent* èåæ©æ¥* and moreSingapore News Features:ï¼Pull to refresh news listï¼Facebook-like menu navigation, you can choose news category easily;ï¼Swipe left/right to read the previous/next news;ï¼Set day or night mode;ï¼Clear the news, save your memory;ï¼Adjust news font size, read comfortably;ï¼Add news to favorite;ï¼Share news with your friends by email/twitter/facebook...;ï¼Enabled/Disabled pictures download;ï¼Manage your news sources, you can enable/disable the news source in menu;ï¼Add/View news comments;CopyRight:- http://www.straitstimes.com (Straits Times)- http://www.channelnewsasia.com (ChannelNewsAsia)- http://www.asiaone.com/ (AsiaOne)- http://www.zaobao.com (èåæ©æ¥)- http://sg.news.yahoo.com/ (Yahoo! News)- http://www.todayonline.com/ (TodayOnline)- http://bbc.com/ (BBC)- http://www.tnp.sg (The New Paper)- If you don't find the news you like, please Email us, we will add as soon as possible.Keywords: Singapore News, Singapore Newspapers, Singapore RSS, Singapore Finance, Singapore Technology, Singapore Entertainment, Singapore Politics, Singapore Food, Singapore Shopping

reviews.title: Using sgs2
reviews.comment: After pullling to refresh, news loading takes a long time to complete esp ST, up to 15min per category. It also slows down the app. This pbm start abt 1 mth ago. Pls look into & fix, else a good app.. TQ

reviews.title: Needs improvement!
reviews.comment: One of the better news reader with simple layout. However, previous version allowed viewing of content, latest update can see titles but upon selecting, just shows blank page. Pls fix with update. Thanks!

reviews.title: Great app!

reviews.title: Suggestion
reviews.comment: Hey there. In the \'Mange News Sources\' settings, perhaps you could add a +/- button to allow for the expand/collapse of a news source instead of just listing all of its sections.  Still a 5 nonetheless!
